sense.def:
Kdor
loses his footing
, mu spodrsne in pade.

seg.quote: He lost his footing, and stumbled to the floor.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
footing
opišemo podlago, na kateri je nekaj narejeno.

seg.quote: We've had to get this on a more official footing.

sense.def:
One's footing with someone
je človekov odnos z nekom.

seg.quote: The school's constitution puts parents on an equal footing with staff.
